channel.title: Gundam Wing on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Gundam Wing on John Cosio

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW
item.description: This is my first take on painting with GIMP. Subject is the Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW version. Practicing adding glowing things to eyes and the scythe. Before After I got some more posts coming up. Cleaning up the Gundam Crossbones and working on the SD Sinanju. Still 2 more SD then moving on to my MG kit or get some HG for practice. This is actually quite relaxing. Haven’t opened Steam in a while.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description:
So after looking around on how to paint and what best way to do this I ended up coloring and working on this using my computer. This is the previous SD we built – Wing Gundam EW Before editing using GIMP Before editing After editing Cleaned up some nubs, changes colors and a lot more easier done.
Pros of using computer Cheaper I didn’t have to buy any paint Faster, it is seen asap.

item.title: Build Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description: KIT: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW Series: Gundam Wing We have another SD from Gundam Wing. The Gundam of Heero Yuy. It’s really cool but I like the Deathscythe more, personal preference I guess. I wanted to start painting but currently still looking and learning from tutorials online. I’m not sure if this EW batch of SD have all of the EW Gundams but it would be great to collect all.

item.title: Build Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW
item.description: I’ve actually posted the edited version first in GIMP Complete Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW I enjoy building these kits then posing them around then taking photos. Figured I can edit them to add details then clean up nubs. Picture time! Tried editing the background out and replacing with space. Space background image in edited photo by Alexander Andrews

item.title: New Hobby: Building little plastic Gundam models
item.description: Some info Last week I got back from Japan. Write about Japan Trip here… <- Future link While I was there, the toys especially Gundam kits seems cheaper so I picked up a couple. Built my first Gundam The first Gundam series I saw was Gundam Wing in our local channel GMA 7 when I was a kid. Duo’s Deathscythe was my favorite and was really lucky I got to pick this up.
